title: Sermons of M. Iohn Caluine vpon the Epistle of Saincte Paule to the Galathians
author: Calvin, Jean, 1509-1564.
publisher: By [Henrie Bynneman, for] Lucas Harison and George Bishop,
notes: A translation of: Sermons de M. Jean Calvin sur l'Epistre S. Paul apostre aux Galates.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Title page in pen facsimile; wormed.
